pageContent: Purpose: Long-term data supporting the role of primary tumor resection in node positive prostate cancer are lacking. We evaluated the impact of adding radical retropubic prostatectomy to surgical castration on long-term oncologic outcomes in pathological node positive prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Salvage cryosurgery for locally recurrent prostate cancer following radiotherapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15583704/
